request.content: We are a group of 5 leaving in 2 days. One of us had a serious accident and won’t be able to come. His girlfriend, who is traveling with us, does not want to come without him. Will the company refund the travel expenses for both of them?
We are a group of 20 and just landed in São Paulo, but 4 of our colleagues (2 couples) need to return home due to the death of the uncle of one of them. Will the insurance reimburse their trip?

I am traveling to Japan and had a layover in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight to Dubai arrived 4 hours late. Although we didn’t miss our connection to Tokyo, will the insurance compensate us for the inconvenience?
We had a car accident in the USA, and a person in the other car broke a leg. They are claiming it was our fault. Will the company cover the expenses?
We are in the mountains, and I attempted paragliding. Upon landing, I injured my right ankle and had to go to the hospital. Will the insurance reimburse me?

We were sailing in the Caribbean, and my daughter was hit on the head by the boom of the sailboat. We had to take her to a private hospital in St. Lucia, which seems expensive. Will the insurance cover the expenses?
I was in Jerez de la Frontera kite surfing when I lost control and crashed into a large buoy. I am now in the hospital. Will the insurance cover the expenses?

We booked a trip for our family of 6, but my husband has severe back pain and previously had surgery for this condition. We won’t be able to leave. Will the company reimburse the trip for all 6 of us?
I am climbing Mount Everest, and my Sherpa accidentally dropped my baggage into a deep ravine, making it unretrievable. Can you reimburse it?

Our football team of 18 players booked a trip to Girona for an international tournament. 2 of our players had an accident 5 days ago and won’t be able to come. Can you reimburse their flights and hotel rooms?
My aunt passed away yesterday, and we are supposed to leave on holiday tomorrow. However, we need to attend the funeral and deal with family matters. Will the insurance reimburse us?

responses.payout_justification: up to the 3rd degree of kinship
responses.response_outcome_justification: Death, illness or injury resulting in[AITIS-DELIMITER]of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of

responses.payout_justification: IMPORTANT: The compensation payable to the Insured is equal to the withdrawal fee (i.e., the penalty stipulated in the travel contract, in the case of cancellation of the same), calculated as of the date on which the event occurred, i.e., the occurrence of the circumstances that resulted in the inability to undertake the trip. Any higher cancellation fee charged by the Tour Operator as a result of a delay by the Insured in reporting the cancellation of the trip to the Tour Operator will remain the responsibility of the Insured.[AITIS-DELIMITER]The Insurance is provided up to the total cost of the trip within the maximum amount per Insured of € 5,000.00 with a limit of € 15,000.00 per event (i.e. fact affecting one or more persons objectively connected by the purchase of the same trip booked by the Policyholder. Included, as long as they have been included in the total cost of the insured trip, are practice management costs, fuel adjustments already provided for on the policy issue date, as long as they result from the booking statement, and the cost of visas. Airport taxes are always excluded if they are reimbursable). Indemnities will be made without application of any excess
responses.response_outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in- law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.

request.content: I am traveling with my family, and all our bags were stolen from our rented car. Will the insurance reimburse the value of what was stolen?
My daughter had a bike accident and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo—will the insurance cover the costs upfront?
I was supposed to be in Mallorca for 15 days, but after 5 days, my mother-in-law had a health issue, and I have to go back home. Will you reimburse the remainder of my holiday?

request.content: We were supposed to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was canceled. We will need to take the next available flight. Will you cover an upgrade if only more expensive tickets are available?
My flight landed 3 hours late in São Paulo. Will you reimburse us?
We are in Mexico, and we received an alarm notification from our home—there may have been a robbery. Will you reimburse the damages?

My 2-year-old child has a cold, and we can’t leave anymore. Will you reimburse our tickets?

request.content: We are a group of 20 and just landed in São Paulo, but 4 of our colleagues (2 couples) need to return home due to urgent work matters. Will the company reimburse their trip?
(Cruise) I have a work emergency and need to cut short my two-week cruise. Will I be reimbursed for the remaining days?

We are traveling in India, and a massive flood has blocked us here. We are supposed to fly home tomorrow, but realistically, we won’t be able to leave for a couple of days. Will the insurance cover the additional costs?

We are a group of five leaving in two days. One of us had a serious accident and won’t be able to travel. Without him, we don’t feel like going. Will the company refund the travel expenses for all of us?

responses.response_outcome_explanation: The company will reimburse some of them. If all of them, it depends on their relationship. If friends, it will reimburse only the affected traveler and one more person. If family, all family members plus one travel companion.

responses.response_outcome_explanation: In principle, the insurance covers the whole family. In practice, as the maximum refund per case is Eur 15000, for a family of 6 it depends on how much it requested for each person.
